p.d: The Mont-Saint-Michel is a place of contradictions. The wide open spaces and sea contrasting with the confined conditions. Marine Barnérias takes us to the summit of the abbey, where we cross the path of one of the inhabitants, along with a monk and a nun from the monastic community, the Fraternities of Jerusalem. Annick and Sabrina are inmates in the Rennes women's prison. Allowed out on furlough, they have an opportunity to walk across the Mont-Mont-Michel Bay. Between imprisonment and freedom.... Guests : Jean Lebrec, artist living on Mont-Saint-Michel ; sister Claire Annaële, member of the religious community the Fraternities of Jerusalem ; brother Fabrice-Marie, member of the religious community the Fraternities of Jerusalem; Thérese, former prison inmate in Rennes. Presented by: Marine Barnérias.
